title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, embed with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama containerized.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to bring Ollama completions into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with context-aware chat sessions.
